short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds similar datasets information on Hugging Face dataset pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hugging Face Similar is a Chrome extension that enhances your dataset discovery on Hugging Face. 

This extension adds a "Similar Datasets" section to each dataset page, offering tailored recommendations based on your current selection. This feature streamlines your research process, making it easier to find relevant datasets for your machine learning projects.
